get.description: All of the subscriptions this application has for real-time notifications.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: Object to monitor - `user`, `permissions`, or `page`.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of properties for the `object` to monitor.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: A callback URL to which Facebook will post subscription updates.

parameters.name: verify_token
parameters.description: Token sent in the verification request.

post.description: Adds a real-time notification subscription for this application.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: Object to monitor - `user`, `permissions`, or `page`. If no object is specified all subscriptions are deleted.

delete.description: Deletes a real-time notification subscription for this application.

parameters.description: Represents the ID of the application object.

parameters.name: native_strings
parameters.description: A JSON-encoded array of strings to translate. Each element of the string array is an object, with text storing the actual string, description storing the description of the text.

post.description: Uploads translated strings for this application.

parameters.name: native_hashes
parameters.description: An array of native hashes. The native hash is a unique identifier of the native string and a description and is generated by the Translations application.

delete.description: Deletes a translation string for this application.

parameters.name: achievement
parameters.description: Unique URL to the achievement.

parameters.name: display_order
parameters.description: Order of this achievement as it shows up in the achievement stories UI (low to high). For example a display order of 100 will be displayed in the UI before 200. We use this value to surface achievements according to the order the developer has specified. Please make sure this value is unique and increments in the correct order for your achievements.

post.description: Registers an achievement for the application

parameters.name: achievement
parameters.description: Unique URL to the achievement.

delete.description: Unregisters an achievement for the application

parameters.description: Represents the ID of the page object.

parameters.name: tab
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the tab.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Order in which the tab will appear on the profile. Must be after permanent tabs and less than the number of installed tabs. Index starts at 0

parameters.name: custom_name
parameters.description: Name to be used for the tab. If this is set to an empty string, the tab will use the application’s default tab name.

parameters.name: is_non_connection_landing_tab
parameters.description: Set this tab as the default landing tab for users who have not liked and are not admins of the Page. If provided, value must be true.

post.description: Updates an installed profile tab for a page

delete.description: Deletes an installed profile tab (where is_permanent is not true) for a page
